body_html: py_func is definitely super useful for quick tests, but it is difficult to make it work well in multithreading contexts. A lot of the problem is due to Python's extremely limiting notion of threading. Nobody is actively working on this right now. @alextp may have more comments.

body: py_func is definitely super useful for quick tests, but it is difficult to make it work well in multithreading contexts. A lot of the problem is due to Python's extremely limiting notion of threading. Nobody is actively working on this right now. @alextp may have more comments.
